manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PERFORMANCE ON ALL LEVELS: THIS IS PUMA. Sport is our world. This makes us passionate about designing, developing, selling and marketing footwear, apparel and accessories. Forever Faster is more than being quick. It is our mantra. It is 70 years of fast products for fast athletes. We aim high, and when we score our goals, we aim even higher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A nice size bag for over night. We take a lot of day trips, and I’d like to keep pet supplies in our car. This is the perfect bag. I’m always prepared with food, treats, leashes, etc. It’s easy to unzip to find what you want. A well made and attractive bag. I bought the black one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exactly as described. Great for a kid sports bag.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this I bought this mostly because of the low price. We use this as a sports bag for kids. we got the first one when our child was a five year old girl and we wanted a bag for dance class and it has grown with her. She’s now eight and we have bought multiple of these bags so her and her brothers sports items for each activity so we don’t have to constantly shuffle stuff between bags for activitia.so we don’t have to constantly shuffle stuff between bags for activitiesImportant to note, these are completely soft, sided and soft bottom and there’s no plastic insert or anything that inherently keeps the bags shape to stand up on its own. important to note, these are completely soft sided and soft bottom and there’s no plastic insert. There are no interior or exterior pockets except for a mesh exterior. That doesn’t do a very good job of holding a water bottle because the pocket is too short but it’s great for storing a small item.there are no interior or exterior pockets except for a mesh exterior. That doesn’t do a very good job of holding a water bottle because the pocket is too short but it’s great for storing a small item. The bag feels like a polyester canvas material, and it does have a water resistant coating on the interior, but it is absolutely not waterproof. The bag feels like a polyester canvas material, and it does have a water resistant coating on the interior, but it is absolutely not waterproof. water resistant so if there was rain coming down and you were running from the car to the gym, your items would be fine but not so that it could withstand a two block walk to the gym in the rain without your items getting wet.Here are some examples of how our bags are packed to get an idea of how much they can hold: here are some examples of how our bags are packed to get an idea of how much they can hold realize these are for items that would fit children ages 5 to 10.There is enough room to easily fit a size 5 soccer ball, shin guards, soccer socks, a soccer jersey and shorts and a change of underwear plus a regular sized water bottle some snacks a tiny first aid kit and windbreaker.and windbreakerFor dance a pair of tights a leotard, a warm-up jacket, pairs of tap, jazz, and ballet shoes, an extra T-shirt, pair of sweat pants and underwear plus a water bottle and snacks.This also makes a great overnight or weekender bag for kids going to grandparents. this also makes a great overnight or weekender bag for kids going to grandparents. I can easily pack an eight-year-old and a four-year-old including FOUR full sets of clothing, (pants, shirt, socks, underwear), four pairs of pajamas, two swimsuits, 2 pairs water shoes, 2 light jackets, and two small, beanie babies style stuffed animals. With all of that if folded correctly, there’s still a little bit of room left.with all of that if folded correctly, there’s still a little bit of room left. I don’t know that the seller would recommend this, but I can tell you from personal experience. These bags can also be treated with spray and wash and thrown in the washer on a cold water wash short cycle with light spin I don’t know that the seller would recommend this, but I can tell you from personal experience. These bags can also be treated with spray and wash and thrown in the washer on cold water, SHORT cycle with light spin and then hung to air dry usually within 4-8 hours. I would not recommend for frequent machine washing, washing in anything but cold in short cycle because it could impact the water resistant coding.I would not recommend for frequent machine washing, washing in anything but cold and short cycle because it could impact the water resistant coding.All around you can’t beat these bags for the price originally when I bought one in 2021, I paid $12 all around you can’t beat these bags for the price originally when I bought one in 2021 I paid $13 now they’re closer to 14 or 16 but they’re absolutely worth it. now they’re closer to 14 or 16 but they’re absolutely worth it. they’re really versatile and because there’s no hard plastic. They’re really easy to fold up and store when not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cute and perfect size
reviews.reviewText: Great size for my gym stuff. It fits adult size sneakers, change of clothes, water bottle, small towel and a few toiletries. The size is approx 13” long and 8” wide/deep. There’s one outer mesh pocket and a hanging loop on the opposite end. I chose the bright pink striped which is colorful and makes me smile. Love this little bag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for people who don't want to use a full size gym bag!
reviews.reviewText: This is such a great size for those who don't carry much, but still need a gym bag. It easily fits a pair of shoes, towel, hydroflask, and blender bottle with a little extra room (enough for a light jacket). It can probably fit a weightlifting belt if you don't pack shoes. There's also a handy side pocket for your keys or wallet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Much smaller than I thought
reviews.reviewText: I thought this was a normal sized sports duffel bag, but it is tiny! It’s my fault as I obviously didn’t pay attention to the dimensions.Surprisingly, it actually fits my 5 year olds soccer gear perfectly (size 3 ball, cleats and shin guards) - even with room to spare. So for little kid sports it will work just fine. If I had realized how small it was before I purchased, I likely wouldn’t have purchased at this price, though. I can’t yet comment on how it holds up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this bag for my ten year old daughter for basketball. It is absolutely perfect. It fits her ball, shoes, waterbottles, and theres still room for other items. She loves it! The design is really pretty too. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gym Shoe Bag
reviews.reviewText: Reading the reviews I was a bit nervous but all in all I think this bag will suite my needs perfectly. Fits women's shoes size 7.5 well with the width of a cell phone left over. As I'm using this as an agility bag there's a mesh pocket on the outside for my dogs fetch toy and a small loop on the other side used for a caribeaner clip. Overall the bag seems of average quality. There is nothing enforcing the design (some bags will have a light rigid plastic like piece) so may be a tad slouchy. Overall happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and spacious!
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my husband to put his clippers and trimmers pouches and boxes inside, everything fits perfectly. There’s a little mesh pocket on the side that I put the hair cutting cape in
I like this bag because I can bring just the things I need onto the floor with me and I don’t have a gigantic gym bag for everyone to trip over
Es bonita, le cabe bastante a pesar de no ser grande, y es muy práctica realmente me a servido mucho, acerca de la calidad de los materiales es muy buena y resistente
Perfect size for a weekend getaway for my 6-year-old! Fits all his clothes.
TMamho excelente pra uma criança de 10 anos.Cabe muita coisa, bem costurada, duas alças, só podia ter bolsos internos pra organização.Cor e estampa lindas
